dict.acceptation: 终止，停止；永不停止的过程；停止行动；

sent.orig: Cease then, prithee, cease thy tune.
sent.trans: 停止，我求你，暂停你的歌声。

sent.orig: You will cease to fear if you cease to hope.
Cease to the struggle and cease to the life.
When you cease to astonished, you cease to be polished.
sent.trans: 当你不再对外界的事物感到惊奇，那你停止进步也就没什么惊奇。

sent.orig: Cease to struggle you cease to leave.
